block.p: HARRISON-Marjorie (Alexander). Of Essex, CT, formerly Andover, Mass and Little Compton, RI. Service will be Thursday August 24 at 11:00AM at St. John's Episcopal Church, Main St. Essex CT. Contributions may be made to Connecticut College, Class of 44, Development Office, 270 Mohegan Ave, New London, CT 06320; The Harrison Scholarship Fund, Phillips Academy, Andover, MA. 01810 or to the charity of one's choice.

HARRISON-Marjorie (Alexander). Of Essex, CT, formerly Andover, Mass and Little Compton, RI. Service will be Thursday August 24 at 11:00AM at St. John's Episcopal Church, Main St. Essex CT. Contributions may be made to Connecticut College, Class of 44, Development Office, 270 Mohegan Ave, New London, CT 06320; The Harrison Scholarship Fund, Phillips Academy, Andover, MA. 01810 or to the charity of one's choice.
